channel.title: ::Item
channel.description: Does anyone have a item command?

item.title: ::Item
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Try Making It 5 Digits Long ");
        }
    }

[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2008, 06:04:47 pm[/size][hr]if you Want It To Be ::Item, Change pickup to item

Read full topic

item.title: ::Item
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Please leave more details when asking questions -.-…

There are thousands of item commands, how should we know if you want the pickup one? Or do you want one to add a Dragon Chainbody? Bronze platelegs? Who knows, use details…
